wikipedia_page.main: Charlie Bell (born 14 November 1958) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League for Middlesbrough and Mansfield Town.

response: Charles or Charlie Bell may also refer to:
* Charlie Bell (footballer, born 1894) (1894–1939), Scottish footballer and manager
* Charlie Bell (footballer, born 1958), English footballer (Middlesbrough FC)
* Charlie Bell (businessman) (1960–2005), Australian businessman; CEO of McDonald's Corporation
There is some uncertainty over the details of Charlie Bell's birth. Some sources report him as being born in Dumfries in Scotland, although RSSSF states that he was born in Cambridge in England.
